Who we are

With two of Australia's leading UK Pension Transfer Advisers, FinSec PTX has all the skills and expertise to help British migrants and returning Australian citizens alike consider what to do with their UK pensions funds.

FinSec PTX uses its comprehensive knowledge of superannuation and the associated legislative environment in the UK and in Australia, to report on the feasibility, taxation issues and cost of transferring your preserved UK benefits to an appropriate Australian superannuation scheme.

Our advice includes the necessary detailed analysis comparing the potential UK benefits against those that would accrue under the nominated Australian scheme.

If and when a transfer is deemed to be the correct course of action, FinSec PTX arranges the transfer from the UK scheme to the nominated Australian scheme.

People migrating from the UK to Australia and Australians returning after working in the UK need to consider several factors when determining what to do with any retirement funds they have accumulated. The rules and laws that cover how, when and where funds can be transferred – and how they are treated from a taxation perspective – are complex and often built on shifting sands. The cost of failure to understand these rules and laws when transferring funds can be extremely high.

David Ford

David Ford our senior adviser has been in the UK industry since 1980 holding various positions, latterly advising employers and trustees on scheme design, administration and technical aspects of UK pension arrangements.

Emigrating to Australia in 1996, David can readily relate to the experiences that migrant clients go through as they take up residency; particularly the impact changing worlds has on their finances and retirement security.

Co-founding Pension Transfers Direct in 1997 and pioneering the pension transfer industry in Australia, David's advice and direction has been sought after by financial advisory businesses and their planners throughout the country.

Qualified in both the United Kingdom and Australia by examination, David also has the vital connections with professional and regulatory bodies as well as many of the product providers in Australia and the UK.

Scott Noell

With 30 years' experience in the financial planning industry, Scott Noell is a partner and key driver of the FinSec Partners business. Scott built his impressive career- foundations specifically within insurance and superannuation before applying himself to more holistic financial planning practices.

Over the last 15 years Scott has actively developed the pension transfer business within FinSec, originally in a working relationship with Pension Transfers Direct and now via FinSec PTX.

Scott's main strength is working with clients to not only facilitate the pension transfer but to ensure that the proceeds are integrated with their Australian assets, in a manner that will best allow them to achieve their goals and objectives.

Scott is very passionate that he delivers real value to our clients' lives; and will do this by challenging their thinking and partnering them on their journey. Married to Jenny and the proud father of two adult boys, Scott is both an avid golfer and a keen traveller.

What to expect Our fully integrated pension transfer solution

  • Fact finding

    1 of 6

    Understanding your current position:

    • Objectives
    • Concerns
    • UK Pension
    • Australian Super
    • Broader personal financial information (if relevant)

  • Design a solution

    2 of 6

    Present and explain our pension transfer recommendations:

    • Should you transfer from the UK to Australia?
    • Comparison of outcomes
    • Contribution Strategy
    • What else needs to be navigated to ensure transfer is compliant in UK and Australia

  • Present & discuss

    3 of 6

    Present and discuss our pension transfer advice explanation and recommendations:

    • Benefits of procedure advice
    • Consequences of not proceeding with advice
    • What are the next steps?

  • Facilitate transfer

    4 of 6

    Facilitate the transfer to Australia

    • Totally integrated service
    • Establish SMSF
    • Register fund for ROPS status
    • Facilitate UK IFA analysis if required
    • Liaise with UK fund to secure payment

  • Integrated advice

    5 of 6

    A fully integrated financial advice solution to maxamise your position including;

    • What super structure to remain in
    • Consolidation of your funds?
    • Investment strategy based on your personal goals and individual risk profile
    • Risk management considerations
    • Transition to retirement (TTR) & Retirement strategy
    • Estate Planning considerations

  • Ongoing review

    6 of 6

    Ongoing review service:

    • Progress towards objective
    • Strategy review
    • Legislative changes
    • Personal changes
    • Investment review
    • Portfolio management
    • Compliance issues

Without the correct advice it is impossible to know whether a transfer is in your best interests or not, yet alone whether it can be carried out correctly.

Regardless of intent, simple mistakes made out of a lack of understanding can have a lifelong impact, often costing thousands of dollars.

FinSec PTX are at the forefront of both UK and Australian legislation and have become experts in interpreting it's impact on the transfer process - a key reason why other advisers outsource this area of expertise to us.
